about_the_game:
Milf Hunter- is a casual game with a simple puzzle. A game that can change your idea of ​​the planets and help you discover them from an unexpected side. 8 representatives of different planets are waiting for you, each of which will surprise you with its originality and uniqueness! Here you will feel like a real space explorer and pioneer!

Features:
  • 8 beautiful alien girls who are in a hurry to reveal the secrets of the Universe for you
  • 32 levels that will truly take you into space
  • Each successfully completed level will give you a surprise
  • Intensive training of your logical thinking
  • The ability to chat with unearthly girls in the truest sense of the word
  • Enjoyment from every space representative of this game

About the characters:
  • Girl Mercury is the smallest and hottest alien personality. Possesses cunning and high intelligence, he values ​​the same in the interlocutor.
  • Girl Venus is a real goddess of love and pleasure, but in the eternal search for her companion.
  • Girl Earth, she has, as they say, "everything is with you", therefore she is demanding in relationships.
  • Girl Mars - seemingly unapproachable and cold, but as soon as you get to know her better, she reveals herself in a completely different amlua.
  • Girl Jupiter is the owner of the most powerful magnetic field, so it will be difficult for you to tear yourself away from her.
  • Girl Saturn - an unusual appearance attracts all lovers of astronomy and 53 faithful companions always turn around her. Will you be able to win your place too?
  • Girl Uranus is a cold and windy representative who dreams that her heart will finally be warmed and all internal hurricanes will be calmed down.
  • Girl Neptune is the most distant and unapproachable, but soft inside. She is ready to open up if you gain her trust.

content_descriptors.notes: "MILF HUNTER" contains scenes showing uncensored nudity and explicit sexual act, bondage/BDSM, classic sexual act interactions centered around sexy female. All characters are over the age of 18. There are no scenes of  drug, or self-harm, alcohol abuse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7/i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
